revised_title: Observations and Analysis of the Great Nebula in Orion
tldr: The author, W. Lassell, shares his observations and analysis of the Great Nebula in Orion, comparing his own drawings and findings with those of Lord Oxmantown. Lassell discusses the resolvability of stars within the nebula and the influence of atmospheric conditions on observations. He also provides a catalog of observed stars and their positions within the nebula.
